context_bundle.summary: 20 PAD subflow patterns: ErrorHandler, DataValidation, Logging, EmailNotification, FileBackup, DBConnectionManager, ExcelReportGenerator, WebScrapingRetry, FileConverter, RetryLogic, DataTransform, ConfigManager, BatchProcessor, CredentialManager, FileWatcher, APIRateLimiter, DataDedup, TaskChecker, DataArchival, HealthCheck

onboarding.quick_start: Import subflow pattern -> Customize inputs/outputs -> Call from main flow. Key: Single responsibility, error handling, logging, input validation
known_errors: Pass only necessary data to subflows - avoid bloat
Return consistent outputs even on error paths
Document subflow purpose and parameters in comments
